web.title: Clubhouse UCLA
web.description: An online platform for reviewing student organizations at UCLA Sign in with a UCLA email to leave a review, or find a club to learn more!

web.title: UCLA Student Affairs
web.description: Student developer for UCLA Student Affairs websites. True Bruin and Financial Education sites coming soon.

web.title: bunnyluv1
web.description: My personal website featuring a playable tamagotchi game, creative portfolio, and blog. Currently going through a refactor from plain HTML/CSS/JS to Astro.

web.title: Morii - Moments That Stay
web.description: A mobile app for sharing and tracking your emotions, analyzing your moods, and staying in touch with your community. Available on the app store!

games.title: Dimensional Detective
games.description: A dialogue-driven point-and-click whodunit game. Solve multiversal mysteries to restore order and peace... can you find the real culprit?

games.title: Psychosis
games.description: A first-person shooter game set in a cyberpunk dystopia. Take drugs to alter state and assasinate your targets to level up. Worked on diegetic UI

games.title: Tama JUMP!
games.description: An endless runner game where you avoid the obstacles. The tama JUMP! console is customizable and doubles as a music player!!
